DOC.detailed_description: Periodical follow-up cohort inflammatory cardiomyopathy patient ( suspect validate inflammatory cardiomyopathy ) recruit baseline SFB/TR19 project . Participants follow least every year - frequently base clinical need . Standardized protocol use assessment medical history examination , laboratory biomarkers , collection various biomaterials biobanking purpose .
